channel.title: Cant login
channel.description:
how come whenever i get on a server it says connection lost and i have to login again and it says error connecting to server and i cant get back on for an hour or so but they are still online?
i did re-download moparscape too

item.title: Cant login
item.dc:creator: @mannymano mannymano
item.description:
@mannymano wrote:

try making you’re own server if u can’t get on the other ones.And if u don’t know how to do that then just tell me and i’ll be glad to help.

item.title: Cant login
item.dc:creator: @clest clest
item.description:
@clest wrote:

They may not be online, and most of the time are not but even tho they have posted there server it will stay on for up to 45mins max, so i should no worry.
